example: Japanese immigrants arrived at the harbor in Santos, Brazil.
Japanese immigrants built a strong community in South America.
Children of immigrants became professionals like lawyers and politicians.
Some Japanese-Brazilians are now famous politicians.
They introduced cultural activities like Judo to Brazil.
Bioethanol is used as fuel for cars instead of gasoline.
Many Japanese companies have branches in Sao Paulo.
Bioethanol is a sustainable energy because plants grow every year.
The price of food might go up if we use too much corn for fuel.
